message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Could you meet me in the middle?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $112.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $108? That's the highest I can go.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $109.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $107? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $108.50. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Could you consider $106? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $107.25. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I think I've reached my limit. I'm willing to pay $106.50, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
